name: Autochess Revolution
description:
Drag and drop your units onto the chessboard. Units will always move in a straight line, and will attack based on chess rules. The game gets increasingly harder the more you progress. Your odds are stacked against you, you cannot win.

You win by getting your units to the end of the chessboard to deal damage to the enemy's HP. Don't let the enemies units reach your starting line!

This game was made in about a week Godot Wild Jam #22 using Godot 3.2.1. The theme is Revolution with the wildcards "Make It Up!".  

Comment in the comment section what your max enemy HP reached is (enemies will increase their HP by 5 per defeat).
